D

displayHangman(int) - 类中的静态方法 hangman.game.HangmanDrawing
Displays the current state of the hangman drawing based on the number of wrong guesses.

E

ERROR_PENALTY_SCORE - 类中的静态变量 hangman.game.GlobalReference
ERROR_PENALTY_SCORE specifies the score penalty for each incorrect guess made by the player.

G

getCurrentState() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Returns the current state of the secret word, showing guessed letters and hiding unguessed letters with underscores.
getGuessedLetters() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Retrieves the set of characters that have been guessed by the player.
getInstance() - 类中的静态方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Provides access to the singleton instance of the game logic.
getScore() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Retrieves the player's current score.
getSecretWord() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Gets the secret word that players are trying to guess.
getWrongGuesses() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Gets the number of incorrect guesses made by the player.
GlobalReference - hangman.game中的类
The GlobalReference class serves as a centralized repository for constants and shared resources used across the hangman game.
GlobalReference() - 类的构造器 hangman.game.GlobalReference
 

H

hangman - 程序包 hangman
 
hangman.exception - 程序包 hangman.exception
 
hangman.game - 程序包 hangman.game
 
hangman.game.input - 程序包 hangman.game.input
 
hangman.utils - 程序包 hangman.utils
 
HangmanDrawing - hangman.game中的类
The HangmanDrawing class is responsible for visually representing the state of the hangman based on the number of incorrect guesses a player has made.
HangmanDrawing() - 类的构造器 hangman.game.HangmanDrawing
 
HangmanGameLogic - hangman.game中的类
Represents the logic behind the Hangman game, handling the game state including guesses, score, and win/loss conditions.
HangmanUI - hangman.game中的类
Represents the User Interface for the Hangman game, managing interactions between the user and the game logic.
HangmanUI(HangmanGameLogic, UserInput) - 类的构造器 hangman.game.HangmanUI
Constructs a HangmanUI instance with the specified game logic and user input mechanism.

I

isGameLost() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Checks if the game has been lost.
isGameWon() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Checks if the game has been won.

L

loadWords() - 类中的静态方法 hangman.utils.WordParser
Loads words from a text file located in the resources directory of the project.

M

main(String[]) - 类中的静态方法 hangman.Main
The main method is the entry point of the application.
Main - hangman中的类
The Main class serves as the entry point for the hangman game application.
Main() - 类的构造器 hangman.Main
 
makeGuess(char) - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Processes a player's guess, updating the game state accordingly.
MAX_SCORE - 类中的静态变量 hangman.game.GlobalReference
MAX_SCORE defines the maximum score a player can achieve in a single game.
MAX_TRIES - 类中的静态变量 hangman.game.GlobalReference
MAX_TRIES represents the maximum number of incorrect guesses allowed for a player in the game.

N

nextLine() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.input.ScannerInput
Reads the next line of input from the console.
nextLine() - 接口中的方法 hangman.game.input.UserInput
Reads the next line of input from the user.
NonAlphabeticInputException - hangman.exception中的异常错误
The NonAlphabeticInputException class is a custom exception that extends IllegalArgumentException.
NonAlphabeticInputException() - 异常错误的构造器 hangman.exception.NonAlphabeticInputException
Default constructor that uses a predefined error message to indicate that the input must be a single alphabetic character.
NonAlphabeticInputException(String) - 异常错误的构造器 hangman.exception.NonAlphabeticInputException
Constructor with a custom message.

P

play() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanUI
Orchestrates the game play, looping through game states until the game is won or lost.

R

resetGame() - 类中的方法 hangman.game.HangmanGameLogic
Resets the game to its initial state with a new secret word and clears all guesses and scores.

S

ScannerInput - hangman.game.input中的类
The ScannerInput class implements the UserInput interface, providing a concrete method to read input from the console.
ScannerInput() - 类的构造器 hangman.game.input.ScannerInput
 

U

UserInput - hangman.game.input中的接口
The UserInput interface defines a contract for input mechanisms in the hangman game or any other application requiring user input.

W

wordList - 类中的静态变量 hangman.game.GlobalReference
wordList is a collection of words used in the game, loaded from an external source through the WordParser class.
WordParser - hangman.utils中的类
The WordParser class is designed to load a list of words from an external resource file.
WordParser() - 类的构造器 hangman.utils.WordParser
